General.Name: Reflect Scientific Inc
General.Description: Reflect Scientific, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the design, development, and sale of scientific equipment for the life science and manufacturing industries worldwide. The company offers Cryometrix ultra-low temperature and blast freezers, which are used to store various products, including blood and cancer vaccines. It also provides laboratory consumables and disposables, such as filtration and purification products, customized sample handling vials, electronic wiring assemblies, high temperature silicone, and graphite and vespel/graphite sealing components for use by original equipment manufacturers in the field of gas/liquid chromatography in the chemical analysis industries. In addition, the company offers solvent chillers and refrigerated transportation products. It serves hospitals, diagnostic laboratories, pharmaceutical and biotech companies, universities, government, and private sector research facilities, as well as cold chain management, chemical, and industrial companies. Reflect Scientific, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Orem, Utah.
General.Address: 1266 South 1380 West, Orem, UT, United States, 84058
